verses.verse: Now a <S%H259>certain<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> of the <S%H802>wives<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H6817>cried<s%> out to <S%H477>Elisha,<s%> "Your <S%H5650>servant<s%> my <S%H376>husband<s%> is <S%H4191>dead,<s%> and you <S%H3045>know<s%> that your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3372>feared<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> and the <S%H5383>creditor<s%> has <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> my <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3206>children<s%> to be his <S%H5650>slaves.<s%>"

And <S%H477>Elisha<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H4100>"What<s%> shall I <S%H6213>do<s%> for you? <S%H5046>Tell<s%> me, <S%H4100>what<s%> do you <S%H3426>have<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%>?" And she <S%H559>said,<s%> "Your <S%H8198>maidservant<s%> <S%H369>has<s%> <S%H369>nothing<s%> <S%H3605><s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H3588>except<s%> <S%H518><s%> a <S%H610>jar<s%> of <S%H8081>oil.<s%>"

Then he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1980>"Go,<s%> <S%H7592>borrow<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> at <S%H2351>large<s%> for yourself from <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H7934>neighbors,<s%> [even] <S%H7386>empty<s%> <S%H3627>vessels;<s%> do not <S%H4591>get<s%> a <S%H4591>few.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H935>go<s%> in and <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H1817>door<s%> <S%H1157>behind<s%> you and your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H3332>pour<s%> out into <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H3627>vessels;<s%> and you shall <S%H5265>set<s%> <S%H5265>aside<s%> <S%H4392>what<s%> is <S%H4392>full.<s%>"

So she <S%H1980>went<s%> from him and <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H1817>door<s%> <S%H1157>behind<s%> her and her <S%H1121>sons;<s%> they were <S%H5066>bringing<s%> [the vessels] to her and she <S%H3332>poured.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> were <S%H4390>full,<s%> that she <S%H559>said<s%> to her <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H5066>"Bring<s%> me <S%H5750>another<s%> <S%H3627>vessel.<s%>" And he <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H369>"There<s%> is not <S%H369>one<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%> <S%H5750>more.<s%>" And the <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H5975>stopped.<s%>

Then she <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1980>"Go,<s%> <S%H4376>sell<s%> the <S%H8081>oil<s%> and <S%H9608>pay<s%> your <S%H5386>debt,<s%> and you [and] your <S%H1121>sons<s%> can <S%H2421>live<s%> on the <S%H3498>rest.<s%>"

Now there <S%H1961>came<s%> a <S%H3117>day<s%> when <S%H477>Elisha<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> to <S%H7766>Shunem,<s%> <S%H8033>where<s%> there was a <S%H1419>prominent<s%> <S%H802>woman,<s%> and she <S%H2388>persuaded<s%> him to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>food.<s%> And so it was, as <S%H1767>often<s%> as he <S%H5674>passed<s%> by, he <S%H5493>turned<s%> in <S%H8033>there<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>food.<s%>

And she <S%H559>said<s%> to her <S%H376>husband,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> I <S%H3045>perceive<s%> that <S%H1931>this<s%> is a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5674>passing<s%> by us <S%H8548>continually.<s%>

<S%H4994>"Please,<s%> let us <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H6996>little<s%> <S%H7023>walled<s%> <S%H5944>upper<s%> <S%H5944>chamber<s%> and let us <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H4296>bed<s%> for him <S%H8033>there,<s%> and a <S%H7979>table<s%> and a <S%H3678>chair<s%> and a <S%H4501>lampstand;<s%> and it shall be, when he <S%H935>comes<s%> to us, [that] he can <S%H5493>turn<s%> in <S%H8033>there.<s%>"
One <S%H3117>day<s%> he <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> and <S%H5493>turned<s%> in to the <S%H5944>upper<s%> <S%H5944>chamber<s%> and <S%H7901>rested.<s%> <S%H8033><s%>

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1522>Gehazi<s%> his <S%H5288>servant,<s%> <S%H7121>"Call<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H7767>Shunammite.<s%>" And when he had <S%H7121>called<s%> her, she <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H559>"Say<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> to her, <S%H2009>'Behold,<s%> you have <S%H2729>been<s%> <S%H2729>careful<s%> for us with <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2731>care;<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> can I <S%H6213>do<s%> for you? <S%H3426>Would<s%> you be <S%H1696>spoken<s%> for to the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> to the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H6635>army<s%>?'" And she <S%H559>answered,<s%> "I <S%H3427>live<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> my own <S%H9415>people.<s%>"

So he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> then is to be <S%H6213>done<s%> for her?" And <S%H1522>Gehazi<s%> <S%H559>answered,<s%> <S%H61>"Truly<s%> she <S%H369>has<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> and her <S%H376>husband<s%> is <S%H2204>old.<s%>"
And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7121>"Call<s%> her." When he had <S%H7121>called<s%> her, she <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H6607>doorway.<s%>

Then he <S%H559>said,<s%> "At <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4150>season<s%> <S%H2416>next<s%> <S%H6256>year<s%> you shall <S%H2263>embrace<s%> a <S%H1121>son.<s%>" And she <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H408>"No,<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> O <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> do not <S%H3576>lie<s%> to your <S%H8198>maidservant.<s%>"

And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H2029>conceived<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> at that <S%H4150>season<s%> the <S%H2416>next<s%> <S%H6256>year,<s%> as <S%H477>Elisha<s%> had <S%H1696>said<s%> to her.
When the <S%H3206>child<s%> was <S%H1431>grown,<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> that he <S%H3318>went<s%> out to his father to the <S%H1>reapers.<s%>
And he <S%H559>said<s%> to his father, "My <S%H1>head,<s%> my <S%H7218>head.<s%>" And he <S%H7218>said<s%> to his <S%H559>servant,<s%> <S%H5288>"Carry<s%> him to his <S%H5375>mother.<s%>"

When he had <S%H5375>taken<s%> him and <S%H935>brought<s%> him to his <S%H517>mother,<s%> he <S%H3427>sat<s%> on her <S%H1290>lap<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6672>noon,<s%> and [then] <S%H4191>died.<s%>

And she <S%H5927>went<s%> up and <S%H7901>laid<s%> him on the <S%H4296>bed<s%> of the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H5462>shut<s%> [the door] <S%H1157>behind<s%> him, and <S%H3318>went<s%> out.

Then she <S%H7121>called<s%> to her <S%H376>husband<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4994>"Please<s%> <S%H7971>send<s%> me <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H5288>servants<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H860>donkeys,<s%> that I may <S%H7323>run<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> and <S%H7725>return.<s%>"

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4069>"Why<s%> will you <S%H1980>go<s%> to him <S%H3117>today<s%>? It is <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H2320>new<s%> <S%H2320>moon<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7676>sabbath.<s%>" And she <S%H559>said,<s%> "[It will be] <S%H7965>well.<s%>"

Then she <S%H2280>saddled<s%> a <S%H860>donkey<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to her <S%H5288>servant,<s%> <S%H5090>"Drive<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> forward; do not <S%H6113>slow<s%> <S%H6113>down<s%> the <S%H7392>pace<s%> for me <S%H3588>unless<s%> <S%H518><s%> I <S%H559>tell<s%> you."

So she <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H3760>Carmel.<s%> And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> her at a <S%H4480>distance,<s%> <S%H5048><s%> that he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1522>Gehazi<s%> his <S%H5288>servant,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> <S%H1975>yonder<s%> is the <S%H7767>Shunammite.<s%>

<S%H4994>"Please<s%> <S%H7323>run<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> to <S%H7122>meet<s%> her and <S%H559>say<s%> to her, 'Is it <S%H7965>well<s%> with you? Is it <S%H7965>well<s%> with your <S%H376>husband<s%>? Is it <S%H7965>well<s%> with the <S%H3206>child<s%>?'" And she <S%H559>answered,<s%> "It is <S%H7965>well.<s%>"

When she <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> to the <S%H2022>hill,<s%> she <S%H2388>caught<s%> <S%H2388>hold<s%> of his <S%H7272>feet.<s%> And <S%H1522>Gehazi<s%> <S%H5066>came<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H1920>push<s%> her <S%H1920>away;<s%> but the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7503>"Let<s%> her <S%H7503>alone,<s%> for her <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H4843>troubled<s%> within her; and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H5956>hidden<s%> it from me and has not <S%H5046>told<s%> me."
Then she <S%H559>said,<s%> "Did I <S%H7592>ask<s%> for a <S%H1121>son<s%> from my <S%H113>lord<s%>? Did I not <S%H559>say,<s%> 'Do not <S%H7951>deceive<s%> me'?"

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1522>Gehazi,<s%> <S%H2296>"Gird<s%> up your <S%H4975>loins<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> my <S%H4938>staff<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> your way; <S%H3588>if<s%> you <S%H4672>meet<s%> <S%H376>any<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> do not <S%H1288>salute<s%> him, and <S%H3588>if<s%> <S%H376>anyone<s%> <S%H1288>salutes<s%> you, do not <S%H6030>answer<s%> him; and <S%H7760>lay<s%> my <S%H4938>staff<s%> on the lad's <S%H6440>face.<s%>"

And the <S%H517>mother<s%> of the <S%H5288>lad<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "As the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2416>lives<s%> and as you <S%H5315>yourself<s%> <S%H2416>live,<s%> I will not <S%H5800>leave<s%> you." And he <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H1980>followed<s%> <S%H310><s%> her.

Then <S%H1522>Gehazi<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> on <S%H6440>before<s%> them and <S%H7760>laid<s%> the <S%H4938>staff<s%> on the <S%H5288>lad<s%>'s <S%H6440>face,<s%> but <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>neither<s%> <S%H6963>sound<s%> <S%H369>nor<s%> <S%H7182>response.<s%> So he <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H7122>meet<s%> him and <S%H5046>told<s%> him, "The lad has not <S%H9516>awakened.<s%>"
When <S%H477>Elisha<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H2009>behold<s%> the <S%H5288>lad<s%> was <S%H4191>dead<s%> and <S%H7901>laid<s%> on his <S%H4296>bed.<s%>
So he <S%H935>entered<s%> and <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H1817>door<s%> <S%H1157>behind<s%> them <S%H8147>both,<s%> and <S%H6419>prayed<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

And he <S%H5927>went<s%> up and <S%H7901>lay<s%> on the <S%H3206>child,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> on his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> and his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> on his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and his <S%H3709>hands<s%> on his <S%H3709>hands,<s%> and he <S%H1457>stretched<s%> himself on him; and the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H3206>child<s%> <S%H2552>became<s%> <S%H2552>warm.<s%>

Then he <S%H7725>returned<s%> and <S%H1980>walked<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H259>once<s%> <S%H2008>back<s%> and <S%H2008>forth,<s%> and <S%H5927>went<s%> up and <S%H1457>stretched<s%> himself on him; and the <S%H5288>lad<s%> <S%H2237>sneezed<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> and the <S%H5288>lad<s%> <S%H6491>opened<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

And he <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1522>Gehazi<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7121>"Call<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H7767>Shunammite.<s%>" So he <S%H7121>called<s%> her. And when she <S%H935>came<s%> in to him, he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5375>"Take<s%> up your <S%H1121>son.<s%>"

Then she <S%H935>went<s%> in and <S%H5307>fell<s%> at his <S%H7272>feet<s%> and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> herself to the <S%H776>ground,<s%> and she <S%H5375>took<s%> up her <S%H1121>son<s%> and <S%H3318>went<s%> out.

When <S%H477>Elisha<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> [there was] a <S%H7458>famine<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%> As the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> were <S%H3427>sitting<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him, he <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5288>servant,<s%> <S%H8239>"Put<s%> on the <S%H1419>large<s%> <S%H5518>pot<s%> and <S%H1310>boil<s%> <S%H5138>stew<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets.<s%>"

Then <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out into the <S%H7704>field<s%> to <S%H3950>gather<s%> <S%H219>herbs,<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H7704>wild<s%> <S%H1612>vine<s%> and <S%H3950>gathered<s%> from it his <S%H899>lap<s%> <S%H4393>full<s%> of <S%H7704>wild<s%> <S%H6498>gourds,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H6398>sliced<s%> them into the <S%H5518>pot<s%> of <S%H5138>stew,<s%> for they did not <S%H3045>know<s%> [what they were.]

So they <S%H3332>poured<s%> [it] out for the <S%H376>men<s%> to <S%H398>eat.<s%> And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about as they were <S%H398>eating<s%> of the <S%H5138>stew,<s%> that they <S%H6817>cried<s%> out and <S%H559>said,<s%> "O <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> there is <S%H4194>death<s%> in the <S%H5518>pot.<s%>" And they were <S%H3808>unable<s%> <S%H3201><s%> to <S%H398>eat.<s%>

But he <S%H559>said,<s%> "Now <S%H3947>bring<s%> <S%H7058>meal.<s%>" And he <S%H7993>threw<s%> it into the <S%H5518>pot,<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3332>"Pour<s%> [it] out for the <S%H5971>people<s%> that they may <S%H398>eat.<s%>" Then there was <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1697>harm<s%> <S%H7451><s%> in the <S%H5518>pot.<s%>

Now a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from Baal-shalishah, and <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> of the <S%H1061>first<s%> <S%H1061>fruits,<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H3899>loaves<s%> of <S%H8184>barley<s%> and <S%H3759>fresh<s%> <S%H3759>ears<s%> of <S%H3759>grain<s%> in his <S%H6861>sack.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5414>"Give<s%> [them] to the <S%H5971>people<s%> that they may <S%H398>eat.<s%>"

And his <S%H8334>attendant<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>"What,<s%> shall I <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>?" But he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5414>"Give<s%> [them] to the <S%H5971>people<s%> that they may <S%H398>eat,<s%> for <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> 'They shall <S%H398>eat<s%> and have [some] <S%H3498>left<s%> <S%H3498>over.<s%>' "
So he <S%H5414>set<s%> [it] <S%H6440>before<s%> them, and they <S%H398>ate<s%> and had [some] <S%H3498>left<s%> <S%H3498>over,<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
